abilities.primary: Emits a dazzling light to blind predators
abilities.secondary: Can glide short distances using its frill

lore.origin_story: Born from the tears of the Moon Goddess, the Lumivine Serpent is said to guard the secrets of the Elysian Glades.

legends.title: The Guardian of the Glades
legends.summary: A tale of how the Lumivine Serpent saved the forest from a great fire by summoning a rainstorm with its luminous dance.
